original_text: And as David and his men went by the way, Shimei went along on the hill's side over against him, and cursed as he went, and threw stones at him, and cast dust.
korean_text: 다윗과 그의 추종자들이 길을 갈 때에 시므이는 산비탈로 따라가면서 저주하고 그를 향하여 돌을 던지며 먼지를 날리더라

sentences.original_text: And as David and his men went by the way
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 사람들이 길을 지나갈 때에

sentences.original_text: Shimei went along on the hill's side over against him
sentences.korean_translation: 시므이는 그를 마주하여 산 쪽으로 따라가며
